io.atomix.primitive.proxy

Interface PrimitiveProxy

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PrimitiveProxyExecutor
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RaftProxy
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    io.atomix.primitive.proxy.impl.AbstractPrimitiveProxy, PrimaryBackupProxy

    public interface PrimitiveProxy
extends PrimitiveProxyExecutor
    Raft client proxy.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  PrimitiveProxy.State
      Indicates the state of the client's communication with the Raft cluster.

      • invoke

        default CompletableFuture<Void> invoke(OperationId operationId)
        Submits an empty operation to the Raft cluster, awaiting a void result.
        Parameters:
        operationId - the operation identifier
        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed with the operation result. The future is guaranteed to be completed after all PrimitiveOperation submission futures that preceded it. The future will always be completed on the
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if operation is null

      • invoke

        default <R> CompletableFuture<R> invoke(OperationId operationId,
                                        Function<byte[],R> decoder)
        Submits an empty operation to the Raft cluster.
        Type Parameters:
        R - the operation result type
        Parameters:
        operationId - the operation identifier
        decoder - the operation result decoder
        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed with the operation result. The future is guaranteed to be completed after all PrimitiveOperation submission futures that preceded it.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if operation is null

      • invoke

        default <T> CompletableFuture<Void> invoke(OperationId operationId,
                                           Function<T,byte[]> encoder,
                                           T operation)
        Submits an operation to the Raft cluster.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the operation type
        Parameters:
        operationId - the operation identifier
        encoder - the operation encoder
        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed with the operation result. The future is guaranteed to be completed after all PrimitiveOperation submission futures that preceded it.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if operation is null

      • invoke

        default <T,R> CompletableFuture<R> invoke(OperationId operationId,
                                          Function<T,byte[]> encoder,
                                          T operation,
                                          Function<byte[],R> decoder)
        Submits an operation to the Raft cluster.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the operation type
        R - the operation result type
        Parameters:
        operationId - the operation identifier
        encoder - the operation encoder
        operation - the operation to submit
        decoder - the operation result decoder
        Returns:
        A completable future to be completed with the operation result. The future is guaranteed to be completed after all PrimitiveOperation submission futures that preceded it.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if operation is null
